content: create this beautiful and cozy crochet baby hat for newborns and babies aged 0 3 months this free crochet pattern is simple soft and perfect for beginners made with gentle baby yarn with matching cardigan jacket it keeps your little one warm and comfy while adding a touch of handmade love this cute baby beanie features an easy round design starting from the crown and working down to the brim with beautiful textured alpine pattern using only basic stitches like chain single_crochet and double_crochet alpine pattern it s a quick and relaxing project for crocheters of all skill levels you can finish one in just a few hours this video tutorial baby hat can more easy for you to anderstand the pattern
